title: League won't download
body: When I first click the download button for league it downloads an installer and than when click the installer nothing shows up.

replies.body: Make sure that you are [downloading ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) league for the proper site, and not through any third parties.  The patcher needs permissions to launch and prepare your installation but it might be blocked form doing so.  Go over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to make sure your settings allow League to be installed.  That should get you fixed up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZE4o4Qza,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-16T20:34:54.860+0000)
>
> Make sure that you are [downloading ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) league for the proper site, and not through any third parties.  The patcher needs permissions to launch and prepare your installation but it might be blocked form doing so.  Go over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to make sure your settings allow League to be installed.  That should get you fixed up!

Okay so now I found out that i needed to find a different way to find LoL.Na.msi to delete the old version of league to download the new version
